name: System

methods.name: abortJob
methods.description: Stops the specified job. The stopped job is still visible in the job queue in the Salesforce user interface.

params.name: jobId
params.description: The jobId is the ID associated with either AsyncApexJob or CronTrigger.

methods.name: assert
methods.signature: public static Void assert(Boolean condition, Object msg)
methods.description: Asserts that the specified condition is true. If it is not, a fatal error is returned that causes code execution to halt.

params.name: msg
params.description: (Optional) Custom message returned as part of the error message.

methods.name: assertEquals
methods.signature: public static Void assertEquals(Object expected, Object actual, Object msg)
methods.description: Asserts that the first two arguments are the same. If they are not, a fatal error is returned that causes code execution to halt.

params.name: msg
params.description: Specifies the expected value. Specifies the actual value. (Optional) Custom message returned as part of the error message.

methods.name: assertNotEquals
methods.signature: public static Void assertNotEquals(Object expected, Object actual, Object msg)
methods.description: Asserts that the first two arguments are different. If they are the same, a fatal error is returned that causes code execution to halt.

params.name: msg
params.description: Specifies the expected value. Specifies the actual value. (Optional) Custom message returned as part of the error message.

methods.name: currentPageReference
methods.description: Returns a reference to the current page. This is used with Visualforce pages.

methods.name: currentTimeMillis
methods.description: Returns the current time in milliseconds, which is expressed as the difference between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

methods.name: debug
methods.description: Writes the specified message, in string format, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

methods.name: debug
methods.signature: public static Void debug(LoggingLevel logLevel, Object msg)
methods.description: Writes the specified message, in string format, to the execution debug log with the specified log level.

params.name: msg
params.description: The logging level to set for this method. The message or object to write in string format to the execution debug log.

methods.name: enqueueJob
methods.description: Adds a job to the Apex job queue that corresponds to the specified queueable class and returns the job ID.

params.name: queueableObj
params.description: An instance of the class that implements the Queueable Interface.

methods.name: equals
methods.signature: public static Boolean equals(Object obj1, Object obj2)
methods.description: Returns true if both arguments are equal. Otherwise, returns false.

params.name: obj2
params.description: Object being compared. Object to compare with the first argument.

methods.name: getApplicationReadWriteMode
methods.description: Returns the read write mode set for an organization during Salesforce.com upgrades and downtimes.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code of the specified object.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to get the hash code for. This parameter can be of any type, including values or object references, such as sObjects or user-defined types.

methods.name: isBatch
methods.description: Returns true if a batch Apex job invoked the executing code, or false if not. In API version 35.0 and earlier, also returns true if a queueable Apex job invoked the code.

methods.name: isFuture
methods.description: Returns true if the currently executing code is invoked by code contained in a method annotated with future; false otherwise.

methods.name: isQueueable
methods.description: Returns true if a queueable Apex job invoked the executing code. Returns false if not, including if a batch Apex job or a future method invoked the code.

methods.name: isScheduled
methods.description: Returns true if the currently executing code is invoked by a scheduled Apex job; false otherwise.

methods.name: movePassword
methods.signature: public static Void movePassword(ID targetUserId, ID sourceUserId)
methods.description: Moves the specified userâ€™s password to a different user.

params.name: sourceUserId
params.description: The user that the password is moved to. The user that the password is moved from.

methods.name: now
methods.description: Returns the current date and time in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: process
methods.signature: public static List<Id> process(List<Id> workItemIds, String action, String comments, String nextApprover)
methods.description: Processes the list of work item IDs.

methods.name: purgeOldAsyncJobs
methods.description: Deletes asynchronous Apex job records for jobs that have finished execution before the specified date with a Completed, Aborted, or Failed status, and returns the number of records deleted.

params.name: dt
params.description: Specifies the date up to which old records are deleted. The date comparison is based on the CompletedDate field of AsyncApexJob, which is in the GMT time zone.

methods.name: requestVersion
methods.description: Returns a two-part version that contains the major and minor version numbers of a package.

methods.name: resetPassword
methods.signature: public static System.ResetPasswordResult resetPassword(ID userId, Boolean sendUserEmail)
methods.description: Resets the password for the specified user.

methods.name: resetPasswordWithEmailTemplate
methods.signature: public static System.ResetPasswordResult resetPasswordWithEmailTemplate(Id userId, Boolean sendUserEmail, String emailTemplateName)
methods.description: Resets the user's password and sends an email to the user with their new password. You specify the email template that is sent to the specified user. Use this method for external users of communities.

params.name: emailTemplateName
params.description: The ID of the user whose password was reset. Name of the email template.

methods.name: runAs
methods.description: Changes the current package version to the package version specified in the argument.

methods.name: runAs
methods.description: Changes the current user to the specified user.

methods.name: schedule
methods.signature: public static String schedule(String jobName, String cronExpression, Object schedulableClass)
methods.description: Use schedule with an Apex class that implements the Schedulable interface to schedule the class to run at the time specified by a Cron expression.

methods.name: scheduleBatch
methods.signature: public static String scheduleBatch(Database.Batchable batchable, String jobName, Integer minutesFromNow)
methods.description: Schedules a batch job to run once in the future after the specified time interval and with the specified job name.

params.name: minutesFromNow
params.description: An instance of a class that implements the Database.Batchable interface. The name if the job that this method will start. The time interval in minutes after which the job should start executing. This argument must be greater than zero.

methods.name: scheduleBatch
methods.signature: public static String scheduleBatch(Database.Batchable batchable, String jobName, Integer minutesFromNow, Integer scopeSize)
methods.description: Schedules a batch job to run once in the future after the specified the time interval, with the specified job name and scope size. Returns the scheduled job ID (CronTrigger ID).

params.name: scopeSize
params.description: The batch class that implements the Database.Batchable interface. The name of the job that this method will start. The time interval in minutes after which the job should start executing. The number of records that should be passed to the batch execute method.

methods.name: setPassword
methods.signature: public static Void setPassword(ID userId, String password)
methods.description: Sets the password for the specified user.

methods.name: submit
methods.signature: public static List<ID> submit(List<ID> workItemIds, String comments, String nextApprover)
methods.description: Submits the processed approvals. The current user is the submitter and the entry criteria is evaluated for all processes applicable to the current user.

methods.name: today
methods.description: Returns the current date in the current user's time zone.

description: Contains methods for system operations, such as writing debug messages and scheduling jobs.
